title: Issue with Window's updatting at start of match
body:
I've had this re-occurring problem all week, without fail i get an unannounced windows update that instantly reboots my computer  within the first 5secs of a match. Im sure this is probably a windows thing i did reinstall windows recently. just the updates happen so vigorously when the comp goes black to reboot and the fact it happens without fail at the start of the match just as champions are appearing on the screen. just wondering if anyone encountered this issue 

PS loaded a version of windows 8.1 and im sure i have my updates set to not go automatically

replies.body:
Do you shut your computer down at the end of every night? If not, you may want to introduce this into your routine, as I've found it reduces the amount of unexpected restarts that occur. You may want to [**get in contact with Microsoft**](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/contactus/) if you're having issues disabling automatic restarts.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I do at least 2 boots a day morning and evening and unless i'm downloading overnight
Thought i had fixed it, played 4-5 games today than had same Crash 1 min into game
What kind of crash? Did you receive a specific error message when this crash occurred?

Screen goes black, if sound is playing it skips. not getting any error msg to go off of. just forces comp to reboot. still only game that having issue. maybe its just one of those things that correct's itself after a patch or 2

Hmm.. This sounds suspiciously like the symptoms players see if the *Game DVR* feature within the Windows Game Bar is causing issues. This feature started getting enabled automatically through windows updates, so I'd like you to follow [**this guide**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to disable the feature if it's been enabled.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

Sorry for delay i had given up after many attempts, i have tried to follow the guide, i wasn't able to find any Gamebar or Xbox app installed but i downloaded the Registry file to turn the settings off. i also reinstalled the game. First match was a success no hiccups however 2nd game crashed on me same issue.

Since the Game Bar wasn't affecting this at all, there may be some issues with your system drivers or hardware that are causing the symptoms you're seeing. I'd like you to reach out to our tech specialists in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and be sure to attach some system logs using our [**Hextech Tool.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)

If you have any issues with this, let me know.

So this isn't occurring due to windows updates, have no updates todo i'm still having this issue. At least once a day not usually my first match 2nd or 3rd. as soon as "Welcome T.." computer crash's, and auto reboots. if im lucky i get back before the rematch vote,  and am a few mins late AND BEHIND! off to reinstall and see if this corrects anything. cause im not getting anywhere in the ladder at this rate. League is the only game giving me issues

P.s the Rematch vote is so broken, Plenty of times i've gotten back before or during vote and even if the votes are 1yes 3no game will rematch and i take the penalty
